trans-unit.source: Represents the XPath transform for a digital signature as defined by the W3C.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class allows you to address an XML document using the XPath language.
This class uses an XPath expression to select the XML nodes you want to sign or encrypt while removing all others from either cryptographic operation.
Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class to sign or encrypt specific parts of an XML document using an XPath expression.

For information on initializing the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class to the value of an XPath transform string, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> method.

The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class is defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigXPathTransformUrl> field.
For more information about the XPath transform, see Section 6.6.3 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> class.

Returns an XML representation of the parameters of a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG `<Transform>` element.

A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object in an XMLDSIG `<Transform>` element.
Returns the output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A> method to retrieve a <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object that contains an XML representation of an XPath transform.
The output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
Returns the output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref>.
The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A> method to retrieve a <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object that contains an XML representation of an XPath transform.
The type of the output to return.
<xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> is the only valid type for this parameter.
The output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref>.
The type parameter is not an object.

Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)"></xref> method of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
The valid input types to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> are <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.

An array of valid input types for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)"></xref> method of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.

Parses the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> object as transform-specific content of a `<Transform>` element and configures the internal state of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object to match the `<Transform>` element.

Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> method to initialize the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class with an XPath transform.
To initialize the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class with an XPath transform, complete the following steps.
Create a new <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> class and set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A> property to the value of an XPath transform string.
Call the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A> method to create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object that represents the transform.

Create a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class and pass the previously created <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> method.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> object to load into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
The nodeList parameter is `null`.
-or-
The nodeList parameter does not contain an element.
Loads the specified input into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.

Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput%2A> method to initialize an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> object to the value of an XPath transform using an <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, or <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object.

For information about initializing an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> object using an XPath transform string, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> method.
The type of the input object must be one of the types in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.InputTypes%2A> property.
The input to load into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.

Gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput"></xref> methods of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> is the only valid output type for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>.

An array of valid output types for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object; the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput"></xref> methods of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object return only objects of one of these types.
